text:
Edgar Hilsenrath (April 2, 1926 – December 30, 2018) was a German writer. He was born in Leipzig, Saxony, Germany. He was known for his works "Night", "The Nazi and the Barber", and "The Story of the Last Thought".
Hilsenrath died in Berlin from complications of pneumonia on December 30, 2018 at the age of 92.

annotations.surface_form: The Story of the Last Thought
